description:
In "Fashion Model", a group of amateur filmmakers get more than they bargained for when they cast a strange looking actress in their new indie movie. And in one of the most critically acclaimed stories from Junji Ito, "Long Dream" asks questions about the nature of reality and perception of time in the face of the mind`s ability to warp both.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ファッションモデル / 長い夢
